Text:
this sounds like an incredible movie...and i know the [myvault] tag assures quality ;)

thanks for this, naturally i'll keep seeding until there are a few more able to help :)
LOL The title is Samsara there's no Sam and no Sara. The film is however fantastic. Sob, sob...
They say it's a beautiful movie,but no seeds no peers! Be kind folks seed this phuleez!

Ah! I managed finally!! Thankyou all. And specially to Sleazy who did the initial up! Absolutely beautiful and what good reproduction. OK!
Now about the the director. Pan Nalin is from a state in India called Gujarat. A simple village boy who aspired to make films.....and here he is. I will not give my interpretation of the film, as I have no intention of spoiling your viewing of this wonderful film. But I can guarantee that you will gasp in awe at every frame. It's a shame they aren't screening it here.
By the way, can anyone tell me how to make a vcd which I can view on a dvd player WITH THE SUBS!?
thanks.. was not able to find this movie on any other tracker....
Wonderful movie. Thanks for uploading and to all the seeder. Will seed it for a day or two.
